isYubiKeyRegisteredFor(String, String) - Method in interface org.jasig.cas.adaptors.yubikey.YubiKeyAccountRegistry
Determines whether the registered YubiKey public id is allowed for the uid received.

org.jasig.cas.adaptors.yubikey - package org.jasig.cas.adaptors.yubikey
 

Y

YubiKeyAccountRegistry - Interface in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.yubikey
General contract that allows one to determine whether a particular YubiKey account is allowed to participate in the authentication.
YubiKeyAuthenticationHandler - Class in org.jasig.cas.adaptors.yubikey
An authentication handler that uses the Yubico cloud validation platform to authenticate one-time password tokens that are issued by a YubiKey device.
YubiKeyAuthenticationHandler(Integer, String) - Constructor for class org.jasig.cas.adaptors.yubikey.YubiKeyAuthenticationHandler
Prepares the Yubico client with the received clientId and secretKey.
YubiKeyAuthenticationHandler(Integer, String, YubiKeyAccountRegistry) - Constructor for class org.jasig.cas.adaptors.yubikey.YubiKeyAuthenticationHandler
Prepares the Yubico client with the received clientId and secretKey.
